data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in South West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,212 believers in the county of South West Khasi Hills the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of South West Khasi Hills, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to South West Khasi Hills, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in South West Khasi Hills who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in South West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.focus_label: South West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary:
the county of South West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India has a population of 110,200.

We estimate South West Khasi Hills has 1,212 people who might know Jesus, 1,337 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 107,651 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of South West Khasi Hills access to a Bible in their own language.
